name: Contact Card Section
description: Displays person information with avatars, roles, contact details, and social links.
bestPractices: Include name, role, and contact info

target.description: Highlight this contact as a target

fields.label: Chief Executive Officer
fields.title: Dr. Sarah Mitchell
fields.note: Key decision maker for strategic partnerships and major business initiatives. Prefers email communication and typically responds within 24 hours. Has extensive experience in scaling technology companies from startup to IPO. Known for making data-driven decisions and fostering collaborative team environments. Excellent at building relationships with key stakeholders and investors.

fields.label: Chief Technology Officer
fields.title: James Park
fields.note: Expert in cloud architecture, microservices, and distributed systems design. Available for technical discussions and architecture reviews. Led the migration of legacy systems to modern cloud infrastructure, resulting in 40% cost reduction and improved scalability. Strong advocate for DevOps practices and continuous delivery. Regularly speaks at tech conferences and contributes to open-source projects.

fields.label: Chief Revenue Officer
fields.title: Maria Santos
fields.note: Met at TechCrunch Disrupt 2024 during the networking session. Very approachable and open to collaboration opportunities. Expressed interest in exploring potential partnerships between our companies. Followed up with a coffee meeting where we discussed market trends and shared experiences in the SaaS space. Keeps in touch via LinkedIn and occasionally shares relevant industry insights.

fields.label: Chief Financial Officer
fields.title: David Thompson
fields.note: Seasoned financial executive with over 20 years of experience in global finance and operations. Successfully led multiple fundraising rounds and managed financial operations across multiple international markets. Expertise in financial planning, risk management, and investor relations. Known for transparent communication and strategic financial guidance. Prefers scheduled calls for detailed discussions.

fields.label: VP of Engineering
fields.title: Dr. Wei Chen
fields.note: Distinguished engineer with a PhD in Computer Science from MIT. Specializes in large-scale distributed systems and platform architecture. Built and scaled engineering teams across three continents. Published researcher with multiple papers on distributed computing and system reliability. Passionate about mentoring junior engineers and building inclusive engineering cultures. Best reached via email during Singapore business hours.

fields.label: VP of Customer Success
fields.title: Rachel Green
fields.note: Extremely customer-focused leader who transformed our customer success metrics, achieving 95% customer satisfaction and reducing churn by 30%. Known for her hands-on approach and ability to build strong relationships with enterprise clients. Regularly hosts customer advisory board meetings and is always open to feedback. Great collaborator who works closely with product and engineering teams to advocate for customer needs. Very responsive to urgent customer issues.

fields.title: Dr. Alexandra Konstantinopoulou-Papadimitriou
